name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
role_name: Senior AI / Computer Vision iOS Engineer
profile_summary:
Senior AI / Computer Vision iOS Engineer with 13+ years of experience creating high-performance applications, specifically in the realms of iOS development. Proven expertise in **Swift** and **ARKit**, alongside a strong foundation in **computer vision**, **object detection**, and **face tracking** methodologies. Demonstrated leadership in guiding teams through complex project lifecycles while optimizing battery performance for mobile applications.
Skilled in leveraging **AI/ML** technologies to enhance user experience and application capabilities, contributing to automation and predictive analysis. Proficient with deploying cloud services on **AWS** and **Azure**, and adept at implementing **microservices** and **event-driven architectures** for scalable solutions. 
Experienced in ensuring compliance with standards—HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. Strong background in **MLOps**, managing model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

experience.role: Senior AI / Computer Vision iOS Engineer
experience.responsibilities:
Exhibited strong **leadership** skills by mentoring junior engineers and leading cross-functional teams in the development of innovative **iOS** applications utilizing **Swift** and **ARKit** for enhanced user experiences.
Developed and optimized **computer vision** algorithms for real-time **object detection** and **face tracking**, ensuring applications perform smoothly and efficiently under varying conditions.
Implemented cutting-edge features focused on **battery optimization**, significantly extending the usability of applications in high-demand environments without compromising performance.
Designed and built feature-rich mobile applications for **iOS** devices, integrating advanced **ARKit** functionalities that improved user engagement and accessibility.
Conducted rigorous testing and validation procedures that included unit and integration tests, ensuring high-quality deliverables and adherence to best practices in coding standards.
Collaborated with design and product teams to translate user needs into technical specifications, enhancing overall application functionality and user interface.
Utilized version control systems and CI/CD tools to streamline deployment processes, reducing time-to-market for application updates by **30%**.
Analyzed user feedback and performance metrics to iteratively improve application features, achieving a user satisfaction rating of **4.8 stars** on the App Store.
Engaged in continuous learning and development, staying up-to-date with the latest trends in **AR**, **computer vision**, and **mobile development**, contributing to the team's strategic direction.

Provided **leadership** in the development of cutting-edge iOS applications utilizing **Swift** and **ARKit** to enhance user experience with advanced features such as **object detection** and **face tracking**.
Led initiatives to optimize battery consumption by implementing efficient algorithms and utilizing **computer vision** techniques, resulting in improved app performance and user satisfaction.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and develop innovative solutions in iOS, focusing on real-time image processing to deliver high-quality results.
Guided the integration of machine learning capabilities into iOS apps, enhancing functionality and enabling features like **face tracking** and behavior recognition.
Conducted multiple training sessions for junior developers on best practices in **Swift** development and advanced **ARKit** functionalities to foster team growth and expertise.
Managed project timelines effectively, delivering high-quality applications on schedule while ensuring alignment with strategic initiatives.
Utilized analytics and feedback to continuously improve app performance, achieving a user adoption rate increase of **25%** within the first **3 months** post-launch.

Demonstrated strong **leadership** by guiding cross-functional teams in the development of innovative iOS applications leveraging **Swift** and **ARKit**, enhancing user engagement with advanced technologies.
Designed and implemented **computer vision** algorithms for **object detection** and **face tracking**, achieving a performance improvement of **30%** in recognition speed and accuracy on iOS devices.
Optimized battery consumption in applications, implementing various strategies that resulted in a **25%** increase in battery life during intensive computing processes, enhancing user satisfaction.
Utilized performance metrics to ensure applications are stable and engaging, achieving a **95%** positive feedback rating and exceeding user expectations in functionality and responsiveness.
Collaborated with teams to introduce AR experiences that blend seamlessly with real-world scenarios, elevating user interaction and increasing app downloads by **15%** post-launch.
Conducted thorough testing and debugging processes to maintain quality standards, leading to a reduction in software bugs by **40%** in released versions.
Mentored junior engineers in skills such as **computer vision** and app development best practices, resulting in successful team project deliveries and enhanced learning culture.
Delivered comprehensive documentation and training on best practices in **ARKit** development and **object detection** systems, ensuring consistent implementation across projects.
